oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Ninth Annual Southeastern Regional Ballet Festival, 1964 April
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A program from the Ninth Annual Southeastern Regional Ballet Festival in Nashville, Tennessee. The show ran from April 24-26, 1964. The program contains a list of performing companies, advertisements for local businesses, performance credits, photographs, and names of donors. Forms part of the Albertine Society Collection. 1 program : col. ; 8.5 x 11 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Southeastern Regional Ballet Association
